history.proof: intros H. apply is_lim_seq_geom in H. srun best use: is_lim_seq_unique.

exceptions.exn: In environment q : R H : is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n) 0 Unable to unify "is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n) 0" with "Rbar_div_pos (Rbar_plus (LimSup_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n)) (LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => q ^ n))) {| pos := 2; cond_pos := Rlt_R0_R2 |} = 0".

original: intros H. apply is_lim_seq_geom in H. unfold Lim_seq. simpl. apply H.
